Html:
Hello,
I am newbie in ATL Server and want to learn this library.
So, I've read about it in "Visual C++ .NET Bible" by Tom Archer and Andrew Whitechapel and was confused when heard Microsoft won't support it in future. I've downloaded the Source Code of the project.
How can I use it with VC 2008? I mean there were a couple of Masters creating all that .srf, .h, .cpp template files and deploying .dlls.
So, in what way can I do it? If the only possible way is manual, can you post an example?
Thank you for help.
